index.description: The output index number of this output within this transaction.

type_id.description: Internal Flipside generated mapping of the type to an integer id.

value.description: Fixed64 - The quantity of value paid to this output. May be 0.

value_denomination.description: The denomination of the value. Default is 'ELA'

output_lock.description: Uint32 - Used to record the lock time of this output, represented as the block height

payload.description: additional content info for the output
